item.title: 0524 BAC
item.description: score:524 Chances: Warren Buffett’s investment model and top stocks often make for good long-term investments, which could potentially attract investors to consider Bank of America as a stable and reliable stock. Investors continued to buy stock and bond funds, with stock funds seeing $4.
